title: Kern website font - Solved - Varela Round
author: Revolution99

comments.content: It could be **[Varela Round](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317163107/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Varela%20Round%20-%20Regular&fid=01f318134e3c656f982ad95c26a57def&fsize=36&text=RICHARD%20KERN%20ABOUT%20PHOTOGRAPHS%20BOOKS&wrap=2)** by Joe Prince [2011, Admix Designs] now part of Google Web Fonts
